Title: Kent Blow Drying and Styling Set 3 (KS30+KS31+KS32)

Radials, hot curls, vents, and paddle designs all with a definitive gloss black and chrome finish come in a huge choice of sizes. They perform endlessly without catching or damaging hair. Rubber grips provide comfort and the streamline, radial handle ensures a successful blow drying technique.

Title: Kent Narrow Satin Wood Pure White Bristle Dressing & Styling Premium Brush
Description: Kent LS1 is a narrow, satin wood, pure white bristle brush. A narrow flat faced dual timber brush made from satin wood and beech. The beech face is filled with stiff white bristle whilst the back is capped in satin wood. A remarkable brush for dressing long hair. The Kent LS1 is a finest luxurious brush suitable for traditional brushing, Brushing with this brush will stimulate and encourage essential oils in the scalp to flow through the hair strands, nourishing and protecting each hair.The stiff bristle helps clean the hair whilst promoting shine and stimulation to the scalp, Its a Luxurious hand finished bristle brush.With a wealth of experience acquired from over 230 years of brush, manufacturing, Kent are confident that they have the most complete, and effective hair brush collection in the world. Title: Tangle Teezer Combo Salon Elite Pink and Aqua Black and White
Description: Tangle Teezer Salon EliteThe Salon Elite Series of Tangle Teezer is the The Detangling Brush and Styling Brush that detangles and styles rapidly, while treating hair with TLC. This pro brush contours the head and produces a perfect brushstroke, root to tip. Salon Elite gives professional results in the palm of your hand. Detangling wet and dry hair without any tugs or pulls, it has an innovative centralised concave design that delivers firm, salon style brushstrokes from roots to ends. Perfect to pick-up-your-preening pace!The most special features of the brush are:PATENTED TEETH: Designed to flex over tangles without pulling or snaggingCENTRALISED CONCAVE DESIGN: Delivers firm, salon style brushstrokes from roots to ends by contouring to the head STRATEGIC TEETH SPACING: Helps reduce matting and knotting around extension and weave bonds. Less hair ends up in the brush and more on your head? Detangles wet and dry hair with no pulling, tugging or dragging.? Ergonomic design makes it easy on wrist and joints, and speeds up the pace.? Use it to brush through sectioned-off hair before blow-drying? Enhances the performance of heat-styling hairbrushes.? After flat ironing, two or three slow brush strokes through each section as it cools will help hair remain straighter longer. ? Reduces hair loss caused by conventional brushes.? Reduces matting and bonding around hair extension bonds.? Makes backcombing a breeze. Produces compact backcombed foundations that stay put.Tangle Teezer Aqua SplashThe Aqua Splash is another breakthrough innovation from Tangle Teezer. It is an ideal backwash brush for a salon or for your bathroom. It is designed to work with water. Detangleswet hair quickly with painless brushstrokes, thanks to the unique, make and ergonomic design.A wide-tooth comb is great for dispensing conditioner through your hair in the shower, but it can get grungy fast. Enter the Tangle Teezer Aqua Splash. The cylindrical, lightweight brush offers a nonslip grip and rounded edges for painless, efficient detangling. It also stands upright on its own, so it can hygienically drip-dry.The most unique features of Aqua Splash are:ROUNDED EDGES: For smooth, free-flowing detanglingHOLLOW DESIGN: For easy, lightweight handlingDRYING FEET: For a hygenic, drip-dry finish? Use as you would a round styling brush?with arolling wrist action.? Curve the brush underneath the hair or on top for effective detangling results.? Ideal for medium to long lengths.? Perfect for distributing color solutions and conditioners evenly through wet hair, top to tip. Turns regular conditioners into deluxe treatments; improves the consistency of color applications.? Distributing rich conditioners evenly with the Aqua Splash prevents spot build-ups that could lead to weak blow-dries.

Title: Tangle Teezer Combo Original Orange and Yellow and Compact Pink and Black
Description: Tangle Teezer The OriginalTangle Teezer The Original professional detangling hairbrush is loved by hairdressers and used in professional hair salons. It's a super smooth operator that works the minute hair is lathered and rinsed. Glides through wet, vulnerable and colour treated hair with no pulling, tugging or yanking. Hair peace at last! If you have been wondering how your special hair stylist handles all those tangles, grab one of The Original for use at home. You will love your hair more and more everyday !? Detangles wet and dry hair with no pulling, tugging or dragging.? Ergonomic design makes it easy on wrist and joints, and speeds up the pace.? Use it to brush through sectioned-off hair before blow-drying? Enhances the performance of heat-styling hairbrushes.? After flat ironing, two or three slow brush strokes through each section as it cools will help hair remain straighter longer. ? Reduces hair loss caused by conventional brushes.? Reduces matting and bonding around hair extension bonds.? Makes backcombing a breeze. Produces compact backcombed foundations that stay put.Tangle Teezer Compact StylerWhether you need quick detangling in the elevator or your car or your cubicle or your date or practically anywhere, the compact styler & detangler comes absolutely handy.Tangle Teezer compact styler & detangler is the new gold standard for hi-voltage hair, An innovative hairbrush that is cute in size and big on style, it can be popped into your bag and pulled out to reboot hair in seconds. It has a removable cover to protect the patented and innovative teeth from fluff and dirt. ? Delivers a glossy finish to every style.? Backbrushes brilliantly to give any look a quick boost.? Then it undoes the backbrushing, quickly and painlessly.? Ideal for short and long hair.? Re-energizes styles with instant shine after a run-in with wind or weather.? Adorable click-on, click-off cover protects teeth from dirt and damage.? It?s a brilliant gift idea!

Title: Corioliss Professional Styling Hair Brush Set 1
Description: Corioliss Soft Cushion Large Paddle Brush with Mic DesignMic Brush has a perfect body shape for detangling and straightening out long hair types. The cushioned soft ball tip quills gently massage the scalp whilst brushing and the soft fluted handle molds to the hand. Features: Anti static rubber cushioned pad prevents fly-away hair Unique, detachable flexible section pin allows easy sections with one handCorioliss Original Classic Combing, Styling & Setting BrushCorioliss Original is the brilliant hallmark range of classic cushioned brushes designed for professional and everyday consumer styling, setting, brushing, combing with all precision and comfort. Corioliss Original brushes have - 100% genuine super fine nylon bristles. Bristles mounted in a fountain arrangement. Rubberized cushion base. Moisture-resistant cushion. Hair products resistant cushion. Premium lacquer finish body. Super light in weight, handbag fit. Fine Nylon Bristles of the Corioliss Original gently massage and stimulate the scalp increasing blood circulation. This triggers the production of Sebum -a natural conditioning oil, which helps to increase strength & vitality of the hair. It gives your hair a gorgeous healthy shine. The Corioliss Original brush is designed and constructed to give you unmatched satisfaction of combing and setting which only a few brushes can. The Flexible Rubber Cushion gives the brush greater movement whilst brushing allowing the bristles to glide over the contours of your scalp. Super fine bristles mounted in a fountain construction clean the strands of the hair with every pass and also prevent damage and tearing of the cuticle. The Premium lacquer finish-like Body and Handle moulds to the hand, ergonomically designed for extra comfort and grip. The Original series of Corioliss is available in three sizes ? Large - ideal for Handbags, Vanity kits, dressing tables, medium - ideal for handbags, purses, glove case, small - purses, gym bags and travel. This brush should not be exposed to harsh chemicals, heat and too much water. Clean your brush periodically with warm towel. Remove residue hair and grime. You Corioliss Original will last you a lifetime as much as you care for it.

Title: Kent AH6G Cushioned Large Detangling Paddle Brush
Description: The Air Hedz Pro Range of Kent is the choice of professionals and consumers the world across. Crafted with the best quality materials from around the world, the body has a profound and rich black mat effect. The handle has rubber grips making it extremely ergonomic and stress free to use. Use your oils, creams and products and if by mistake you grab the brush, it just won?t slip off your hands. If you comb your hair too often or have a great amount of styling, setting &combing to do at home or in a salon, this rubberized handle won?t stress your wrists and fingers much.The bristles are mounted on a rubberized base, this base is resistant to water, treatments, conditioners, creams and product build-ups. High quality rubberized base gives that extra bounce, cushion and life to the brush.The hallmark of this series is the super premium quality of bristles, which are polished and finished using the most advanced technology. Due to this the bristles do not scratch the cuticle or damage your hair. When you use the brush for blow-drying, setting, styling or blast drying, the bristles close the cuticle and impart gloss and shine to the hair. Made with a very high quality premium material, these bristles are heat resistant imparting years to the life of the brush. Investment in a good quality brush makes a lot of sense when you spend thousands on consumable products like shampoos, conditioners and treatments. Kent Air Hedz Pro range is one such great investment you will make.You ideal routine after a shampoo or hair wash should be conditioning, detangling and then combing and if required blow-drying. Do no go straight from a shampoo to combing. Your hair and hair roots are in the weakest form when wet. Don?t detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb, although you don?t see a lot of hair in the comb after the detangling process, but you would have damaged your hair to a great extent and the hair would have fallen off if not on comb.The AH6 is a great detangling brush which allows you to detangle your hair with ease and then comb and set them with absolute control. Ideal for medium to long and very long hair. You can use the AH6 as a detangling, combing and blow-drying brush.Kent is a 235 years old British brand of brushes. Known for its superior quality and innovations, Kent is the largest and oldest brush company in the world. Kent offers everything in brushes ranging from hair, tooth, body, nail, and shoe brushes for the quality-seeking consumer who wants nothing but the very best in the world.

It's a super smooth operator that works the minute hair is lathered and rinsed. Glides through wet, vulnerable and colour treated hair with no pulling, tugging or yanking. Hair peace at last! If you have been wondering how your special hair stylist handles all those tangles, grab one of The Original for use at home. You will love your hair more and more everyday !? Detangles wet and dry hair with no pulling, tugging or dragging.? Ergonomic design makes it easy on wrist and joints, and speeds up the pace.? Use it to brush through sectioned-off hair before blow-drying? Enhances the performance of heat-styling hairbrushes.? After flat ironing, two or three slow brush strokes through each section as it cools will help hair remain straighter longer. ? Reduces hair loss caused by conventional brushes.? Reduces matting and bonding around hair extension bonds.? Makes backcombing a breeze. Produces compact backcombed foundations that stay put.Tangle Teezer Aqua SplashThe Aqua Splash is another breakthrough innovation from Tangle Teezer. It is an ideal backwash brush for a salon or for your bathroom. It is designed to work with water. Detangleswet hair quickly with painless brushstrokes, thanks to the unique, make and ergonomic design.A wide-tooth comb is great for dispensing conditioner through your hair in the shower, but it can get grungy fast. Enter the Tangle Teezer Aqua Splash. The cylindrical, lightweight brush offers a nonslip grip and rounded edges for painless, efficient detangling. It also stands upright on its own, so it can hygienically drip-dry.The most unique features of Aqua Splash are:ROUNDED EDGES: For smooth, free-flowing detanglingHOLLOW DESIGN: For easy, lightweight handlingDRYING FEET: For a hygenic, drip-dry finish? Use as you would a round styling brush?with arolling wrist action.? Curve the brush underneath the hair or on top for effective detangling results.? Ideal for medium to long lengths.? Perfect for distributing color solutions and conditioners evenly through wet hair, top to tip. Turns regular conditioners into deluxe treatments; improves the consistency of color applications.? Distributing rich conditioners evenly with the Aqua Splash prevents spot build-ups that could lead to weak blow-dries.

Title: Corioliss Professional Styling Hair Brush Set 3
Description: Corioliss Soft Cushion Large Paddle Brush with Mic DesignMic Brush has a perfect body shape for detangling and straightening out long hair types. The cushioned soft ball tip quills gently massage the scalp whilst brushing and the soft fluted handle molds to the hand. Features: Anti static rubber cushioned pad prevents fly-away hair Unique, detachable flexible section pin allows easy sections with one handCorioliss Original Classic Combing, Styling & Setting BrushCorioliss Original is the brilliant hallmark range of classic cushioned brushes designed for professional and everyday consumer styling, setting, brushing, combing with all precision and comfort. Corioliss Original brushes have - 100% genuine super fine nylon bristles. Bristles mounted in a fountain arrangement. Rubberized cushion base. Moisture-resistant cushion. Hair products resistant cushion. Premium lacquer finish body. Super light in weight, handbag fit. Fine Nylon Bristles of the Corioliss Original gently massage and stimulate the scalp increasing blood circulation. This triggers the production of Sebum -a natural conditioning oil, which helps to increase strength & vitality of the hair. It gives your hair a gorgeous healthy shine. The Corioliss Original brush is designed and constructed to give you unmatched satisfaction of combing and setting which only a few brushes can. The Flexible Rubber Cushion gives the brush greater movement whilst brushing allowing the bristles to glide over the contours of your scalp. Super fine bristles mounted in a fountain construction clean the strands of the hair with every pass and also prevent damage and tearing of the cuticle. The Premium lacquer finish-like Body and Handle moulds to the hand, ergonomically designed for extra comfort and grip. The Original series of Corioliss is available in three sizes ? Large - ideal for Handbags, Vanity kits, dressing tables, medium - ideal for handbags, purses, glove case, small - purses, gym bags and travel. This brush should not be exposed to harsh chemicals, heat and too much water. Clean your brush periodically with warm towel. Remove residue hair and grime. You Corioliss Original will last you a lifetime as much as you care for it.

Title: Kent Combo AHGLO1 Everyday Combing & Styling Brush(Raspb+Lime)
Description: With a wealth of experience acquired from over 230 years of brush, manufacturing, Kent are confident that they have the most complete, and effective hair brush collection in the world. Rubber grips provide comfort and the streamline, radial handle ensures a successful blow drying technique.

Title: Tangle Teezer Limited Edition Lulu Guiness Compact Styler Detangling Brush
Description: If you have loved the Compacts by Tangle Teezer, this new LIMITED EDITION COLLECTIBLE is bound to drive you nuts. The hottest addition to our classic collection of cute Compact Stylers. This super stylish Detangler is the must have accessory of the season. This collectable is inspired by the designer Lulu Guinness and kept in her trademark black, white and red style. ""Forcefully brushing through your hair after showering is really, really bad for it; your hair is more fragile when its wet, therefore, ripping through with a comb or brush causes breakage, and will also pull a lot of it out. You might be left with a lot of hair in your comb/brush than on your head. Tangle Teezers are the solution for detangling any type of hair around the world. The tangle teezer glides through your hair without tugging it, it causes a lot less damage, and therefore its much kinder to your hair than a regular brush or comb.They add a surprisingly amazing shine and gloss while detangling your hair. Whether you need quick detangling in the elevator or your car or your cubicle or your date or practically anywhere, the compact styler & detangler comes absolutely handy. Tangle Teezer compact styler & detangler is the new gold standard for hi-voltage hair, An innovative hairbrush that is cute in size and big on style, it can be popped into your bag and pulled out to reboot hair in seconds. It has a removable cover to protect the patented and innovative teeth from fluff and dirt. This compact Styler delivers gloss & shine to finish every style. Backbrushes brilliantly to give any look a quick boost. Then it undoes the backbrushing, quickly and painlessly. Ideal for short and long hair. Re-energizes styles with instant shine after a run-in with wind or weather. Adorable click-on, click-off cover protects teeth from dirt and damage. It?s a brilliant gift idea.The Tangle Teezer Compact Style is not just any plain-jane brusht it also:  Delivers a glossy finish to every style. Backbrushes brilliantly to give any look a quick boost. Then it undoes the backbrushing, quickly and painlessly. Ideal for short and long hair. Re-energizes styles with instant shine after a run-in with windor weather. Adorable click-on, click-off cover protects teeth from dirt anddamage. Its a brilliant gift idea!Tangle Teezer Compact Styler can be used with oil, shampoo, water, treatments, conditioners, hair spa treatments and practically anything except acidic products and excess heat.Take good care of this little darling and it will surely last you ages. ""Tangle Teezers uniquely designed teeth flex and flick as they glide through the hair, eliminating tangles and knots on contact, minimising breakage, splitting, and damage caused by mistreatment. Its perfect for all hair types and is specially recommended for fragile or colour-treated hair, hair extensions, weaves and childrens fine tangle-prone hair. With its new smaller size and colour, the Compact Styler Lulu Guinness will be your new favourite handbag addition.The Tangle Teezer is ideal for scalp massage delivering a blissful, stimulating sensation, particularly for hair extension wearers, offering improved comfort of wear, and maintaining tip-top tangle-free extensions throughout the day.

Title: Corioliss Professional Blow Drying & Styling Hair Brush Set 3
Description: Corioliss Red Line Professional Blowdrying & Styling BrushCorioliss presents the brush red line edition, with a thermochromic colour change body and a light ceramic barrel that emits negative ions when hot. The fixed nylon find toothed combs are ideal for application of conditioning treatments, evenly sectioning the hair for greater concentrated distribution. A soft fluted handle that moulds to the hand for ultimate styling control and a unique detachable pin for sectioning gives the ultimate in comfort and professional styling. Features - Thermochromic colour change body shows working temperature and ionic effect Individual flame sealed fibres prevent tearing of the cuticle. Available in extra small, small, medium and large. Multipurpose tool: Can be used for styling, straightening, curling, setting and drying your hair. Thermochromic: Color changing barrel tells you when the brush is hot and ionization ready for use. Redline Comb technology: Ideal for product application such as keratin treatments, hair spa products, hair treatment products, etc. You can continue your blow drying while the redline takes care of even and consistent spreading and application of the product. Light Ceramic Barrel: Ceramic emits negative ions when hot eliminating static and frizz from your hair. Excellent Heat Retaining: Pure ceramic coating retains heat throughout styling hence you don?t need to keep the dryer on all the time. Flexible Sectioning Pin: Unique detachable sectioning pin allows easy sectioning with one hand. Soft Fluted handle: Ergonomically designed and rubberized for best grip and stress-free prolonged usage.Corioliss Soft Cushion Large Paddle Brush with Mic DesignMic Brush has a perfect body shape for detangling and straightening out long hair types. The cushioned soft ball tip quills gently massage the scalp whilst brushing and the soft fluted handle molds to the hand. Features: Anti static rubber cushioned pad prevents fly-away hair Unique, detachable flexible section pin allows easy sections with one handCorioliss Original Classic Combing, Styling & Setting BrushCorioliss Original is the brilliant hallmark range of classic cushioned brushes designed for professional and everyday consumer styling, setting, brushing, combing with all precision and comfort. Corioliss Original brushes have - 100% genuine super fine nylon bristles. Bristles mounted in a fountain arrangement. Rubberized cushion base. Moisture-resistant cushion. Hair products resistant cushion. Premium lacquer finish body. Super light in weight, handbag fit. Fine Nylon Bristles of the Corioliss Original gently massage and stimulate the scalp increasing blood circulation. This triggers the production of Sebum -a natural conditioning oil, which helps to increase strength & vitality of the hair. It gives your hair a gorgeous healthy shine. The Corioliss Original brush is designed and constructed to give you unmatched satisfaction of combing and setting which only a few brushes can. The Flexible Rubber Cushion gives the brush greater movement whilst brushing allowing the bristles to glide over the contours of your scalp. Super fine bristles mounted in a fountain construction clean the strands of the hair with every pass and also prevent damage and tearing of the cuticle. The Premium lacquer finish-like Body and Handle moulds to the hand, ergonomically designed for extra comfort and grip. The Original series of Corioliss is available in three sizes ? Large - ideal for Handbags, Vanity kits, dressing tables, medium - ideal for handbags, purses, glove case, small - purses, gym bags and travel. This brush should not be exposed to harsh chemicals, heat and too much water. Clean your brush periodically with warm towel. Remove residue hair and grime. You Corioliss Original will last you a lifetime as much as you care for it.Corioliss Professional Straightening CombThe Straightening Comb, Suitable for all hair types, Sections and detangles the hair in one easy stroke, Eliminates static. Ideal to use with all styling irons and dryers. Perfect for touch ups or on the go, Great for distribution of conditioner and treatments, Designed with an ultra flexible plastic body this must-have styling accessory uses ventilation holes to aid heat styling while also sectioning and detangling your locks for that just out of the salon look, The most important feature of the straightening comb are:1 - Ventilation holes aid moisture to escape whilst heat styling, 2 - Flexible and durable plastic body.

Title: Denman D18 Row Medium Soft Styler
Kent Combo Detangling, Combing & Setting Rich Metallic Grey Set6
Description: Kent AHP10 & AHP11 ? Detangling, Combing & Setting Combo Rich Metallic GreyThe Air Hedz Pro (AHP) Range of Kent is the choice of professionals and consumers the world across. Crafted with the best quality materials from around the world, the body has a profound and rich gloss metallic-grey effect. The handle has rubber grips making it extremely ergonomic and stress free to use. Use your oils, creams and products and if by mistake you grab the brush, it just won?t slip off your hands. If you comb your hair too often or have a great amount of styling, setting & combing to do at home or in a salon, this rubberized handle won?t stress your wrists and fingers much.The bristles are mounted on a rubberized base, this base is resistant to water, treatments, conditioners, creams and product build-ups. High quality rubberized base gives that extra bounce, cushion and life to the brush.The hallmark of this series is the super premium quality of bristles, which are polished and finished using the most advanced technology. Due to this the bristles do not scratch the cuticle or damage your hair. When you use the brush for blow-drying, setting, styling or blast drying, the bristles close the cuticle and impart gloss and shine to the hair. Made with a very high quality premium material, these bristles are heat resistant imparting years to the life of the brush. Investment in a good quality brush makes a lot of sense when you spend thousands on consumable products like shampoos, conditioners and treatments. Kent Air Hedz series is one such great investment you will make.You ideal routine after a shampoo or hair wash should be conditioning, detangling and then combing and if required blow-drying. Do no go straight from a shampoo to combing. Your hair and hair roots are in the weakest form when wet. Don?t detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb, although you don?t see a lot of hair in the comb after the detangling process, but you would have damaged your hair to a great extent and the hair would have fallen off if not on comb.The AHP10 & AHP11 is a great detangling and styling combo allowing you to detangle your hair with ease and then comb and set them with absolute control. Ideal for short to medium hair this combination is every hair aficionados dream come true. You can use the AHP10 as a detangling, combing and blow-drying brush too. The AHP11 can accompany you to your work, office, & college for your combing and setting needs throughout the day. Make this combo a part of your daily hair care routine at home, car or office and your hair will thank you for this.Kent is a 235 years old British brand of brushes. Known for its superior quality and innovations, Kent is the largest and oldest brush company in the world. Kent offers everything in brushes ranging from hair, tooth, body, nail, and shoe brushes for the quality-seeking consumer who wants nothing but the very best in the world.

Title: Corioliss Hair Combing, Paddle & Thermal Brush Combo Set 3

Title: Corioliss Professional Blow Drying & Styling Hair Brush Set 2
Description: Corioliss Thermochromic Ceramic Barrel BrushCorioliss presents the brush, with a thermochromic colour change body and a light ceramic barrel that emits negative ions when hot. A soft fluted handle and a unique detachable pin for sectioning gives the ultimate in comfort and professional styling. Features: Thermochromic colour change body shows working temperature and ionic effect Individual flame sealed fibres prevent tearing of the cuticle. Available in extra small, extra small, small, medium and large. Multipurpose tool: Can be used for styling, straightening, curling, setting and drying your hair. Thermochromic: Color changing barrel tells you when the brush is hot and ionization ready for use. Light Ceramic Barrel: Ceramic emits negative ions when hot eliminating static and frizz from your hair. Excellent Heat Retaining: Pure ceramic coating retains heat throughout styling hence you don?t need to keep the dryer on all the time. Flexible Sectioning Pin: Unique detachable sectioning pin allows easy sectioning with one hand. Hair products resistant cushion. Premium lacquer finish body. Super light in weight, handbag fit. Fine Nylon Bristles of the Corioliss Original gently massage and stimulate the scalp increasing blood circulation. This triggers the production of Sebum -a natural conditioning oil, which helps to increase strength & vitality of the hair. It gives your hair a gorgeous healthy shine. The Corioliss Original brush is designed and constructed to give you unmatched satisfaction of combing and setting which only a few brushes can. The Flexible Rubber Cushion gives the brush greater movement whilst brushing allowing the bristles to glide over the contours of your scalp. Super fine bristles mounted in a fountain construction clean the strands of the hair with every pass and also prevent damage and tearing of the cuticle. Large - ideal for Handbags, Vanity kits, dressing tables, medium - ideal for handbags, purses, glove case, small - purses, gym bags and travel. This brush should not be exposed to harsh chemicals, heat and too much water. Clean your brush periodically with warm towel. Remove residue hair and grime. You Corioliss Original will last you a lifetime as much as you care for it.Corioliss Professional Straightening CombThe Straightening Comb, Suitable for all hair types, Sections and detangles the hair in one easy stroke, Eliminates static. Ideal to use with all styling irons and dryers. Perfect for touch ups or on the go, Great for distribution of conditioner and treatments, Designed with an ultra flexible plastic body this must-have styling accessory uses ventilation holes to aid heat styling while also sectioning and detangling your locks for that just out of the salon look, The most important feature of the straightening comb are:1 - Ventilation holes aid moisture to escape whilst heat styling, 2 - Flexible and durable plastic body.

Title: Tangle Teezer Aqua Splash Detangling Brush
Description: The Aqua Splash is a breakthrough innovation from Tangle Teezer. It is an ideal backwash brush for a salon or for your bathroom. It is designed to work with water. Detangles wet hair quickly with painless brushstrokes, thanks to the unique, make and ergonomic design. A wide-tooth comb is great for dispensing conditioner through your hair in the shower, but it can get grungy fast. Enter the Tangle Teezer Aqua Splash. The cylindrical, lightweight brush offers a nonslip grip and rounded edges for painless, efficient detangling. It also stands upright on its own, so it can hygienically drip-dry. Curve the brush underneath the hair or on top for effective detangling results. Ideal for medium to long lengths. Perfect for distributing color solutions and conditioners evenly through wet hair, top to tip. Turns regular conditioners into deluxe treatments; improves the consistency of color applications. Distributing rich conditioners evenly with the Aqua Splash prevents spot build-ups that could lead to weak blow-dries.

Title: Tangle Teezer Patented Blow Styling Brush Half Paddle
Description: "The TANGLE TEEZER Blow-Styling Half Paddle hairbrush is especially designed for medium to short hair. Having revolutionised how we detangle our hair, TANGLE TEEZER have now created another ground-breaking hairbrush - this time designed to to make the job of creating salon blow-dry results at home, much quicker and easier.The secret is in the design of the teeth. Now, you don't have to be a professional, you just need to trust in the brush.Quick-drying teeth rapidly extract surface water from the hair shaft. Unique cleaning grooves makes for easy hair removal and cleaning without damaging the teeth. The revolutionary teeth will give your hair volume, shine, less frizz and smoother hair without stretch-drying. You may also find there's no need to use straighteners afterwards - thus saving even more time. Genius!How to UseFor professional salon blow-drying results at home. Simply towel dry your hair, set your hair dryer to a medium setting and begin to dry as normal. Quick-drying results, volume, movement and reduced frizz are built into the technology of the teeth. All you need to do is trust in the brush. A TANGLE TEEZER Blow-Styling brush is unlike any other Paddle brush. It has been designed using smart-teeth technology to give an amazing finish that even friends will notice.2) It is a professional tool for Blow-Styling  it is not like a regular hairbrush. Thats why the teeth are stiffer.3) The smoother the brushstroke  the quicker the hair will dry. Thats the one lesson you can pass onto your salons. Slow down the brushstroke. And then JUST TRUST THE BRUSH !!"

Title: Tangle Teezer Patended Blow Styling Brush Full Paddle
Description: The TANGLE TEEZER Blow-Styling Full Paddle hairbrush is especially designed for medium to long hair. Having revolutionised how we detangle our hair, TANGLE TEEZER have now created another ground-breaking hairbrush - this time designed to to make the job of creating salon blow-dry results at home, much quicker and easier.The secret is in the design of the teeth. Now, you don't have to be a professional, you just need to trust in the brush.Quick-drying teeth rapidly extract surface water from the hair shaft. Unique cleaning grooves makes for easy hair removal and cleaning without damaging the teeth. The revolutionary teeth will give your hair volume, shine, less frizz and smoother hair without stretch-drying. You may also find there's no need to use straighteners afterwards - thus saving even more time. Genius!How to UseFor professional salon blow-drying results at home. Simply towel dry your hair, set your hair dryer to a medium setting and begin to dry as normal. Quick-drying results, volume, movement and reduced frizz are built into the technology of the teeth. All you need to do is trust in the brush. A TANGLE TEEZER Blow-Styling brush is unlike any other Paddle brush. It has been designed using smart-teeth technology to give an amazing finish that even friends will notice.2) It is a professional tool for Blow-Styling  it is not like a regular hairbrush. Thats why the teeth are stiffer.3) The smoother the brushstroke  the quicker the hair will dry. Thats the one lesson you can pass onto your salons. Slow down the brushstroke. And then JUST TRUST THE BRUSH !!

Title: Kent BRD 2 Limited Edition Beard Brush
Description: A Heritage Brand, Kent Has Been Making Brushes And Combs For The Last 238 Years Thus Making It One Of The Oldest Bruh Company In The World. Made And Manufactured In England, Kent Has Earned Itseld The Reputation Of Producing Quality Brushes Ranging From Hair, Tooth, Body, Nail, And Shoe Brushes. Kent Beard BrushIts So Truly Said: "Some Men Build A Legacy, But Real Men Grow One." Taking On The Mantle To Pamper, Groom And Protect This Legacy (Read: Beard), Kent Brushes Offers The First Of Its Kind Beard Brush. Made From 100% Real Beechwood And Bore Bristles, The Brush Has Been Launched After Years Of Research. Possibly The First Brush To Highlight And Amplify The Incredibleness Of Your Breath Taking Beard.Starting With The Handle, The Design Is Carefully Executed To Ensure That The Fisted Hand Holding The Brush Is Away From The Face So That The Brush Head Has An Uninterrupted Canvas For Grooming And Styling. The Handle Resembles A Flintlock Pistol Grip, Which Is Far More Manly Than Anything Else We Could Think Of. The Bristle Opted Are Of The Finest Quality, Stiff And Tough Enough To Handle The Coarsest Of Facial Foliage Yet Soft Enough Not To Tear The Skin Off Your Face. Position The Brush With The Longer Bristles Above The Shorter One And Brush Down. The Bristle Of The Brush Will Penetrate The Beard Down To The Skin And Glide Through, Rearranging, Neatening And Cleaning The Beard. Each Brush Comes With A Beautiful Hand-Stitched Cotton Bag Printed On Both Sides. Not Only A Handy Bag To Store Your Brush In But For Those Who Use Beard Oil It Will Protect Your Clothes From Any Excess Oil Held In The Brush Head From Leaching Into Unwanted Places E.G. Your Suit Pocket Or The Lining Of Your Favourite Man Bag.

Title: Kent AH7W Cushioned Large Setting & Styling Paddle Brush
Description: The Air Hedz Pro Range of Kent is the choice of professionals and consumers the world across. Crafted with the best quality materials from around the world, the body has a profound and rich white mat effect. The handle has rubber grips making it extremely ergonomic and stress free to use. Use your oils, creams and products and if by mistake you grab the brush, it just won?t slip off your hands. If you comb your hair too often or have a great amount of styling, setting &combing to do at home or in a salon, this rubberized handle won?t stress your wrists and fingers much.The bristles are mounted on a rubberized base, this base is resistant to water, treatments, conditioners, creams and product build-ups. High quality rubberized base gives that extra bounce, cushion and life to the brush.The hallmark of this series is the super premium quality of bristles, which are polished and finished using the most advanced technology. Due to this the bristles do not scratch the cuticle or damage your hair. When you use the brush for blow-drying, setting, styling or blast drying, the bristles close the cuticle and impart gloss and shine to the hair. Made with a very high quality premium material, these bristles are heat resistant imparting years to the life of the brush. Investment in a good quality brush makes a lot of sense when you spend thousands on consumable products like shampoos, conditioners and treatments. Kent Air Hedz Pro range is one such great investment you will make.You ideal routine after a shampoo or hair wash should be conditioning, detangling and then combing and if required blow-drying. Do no go straight from a shampoo to combing. Your hair and hair roots are in the weakest form when wet. Don?t detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb, although you don?t see a lot of hair in the comb after the detangling process, but you would have damaged your hair to a great extent and the hair would have fallen off if not on comb.The AH7 can accompany you to your work, office, & college for your combing and setting needs throughout the day. Make this brush a part of your daily hair care routine at home, car or office and your hair will thank you for this.Kent is a 235 years old British brand of brushes. Known for its superior quality and innovations, Kent is the largest and oldest brush company in the world. Kent offers everything in brushes ranging from hair, tooth, body, nail, and shoe brushes for the quality-seeking consumer who wants nothing but the very best in the world.

Large - ideal for Handbags, Vanity kits, dressing tables, medium - ideal for handbags, purses, glove case, small - purses, gym bags and travel. This brush should not be exposed to harsh chemicals, heat and too much water. Clean your brush periodically with warm towel. Remove residue hair and grime. You Corioliss Original will last you a lifetime as much as you care for it.

Title: Kent AH8G Cushioned Medium Detangling Hair Brush
Description: The Air Hedz Pro (AHP) Range of Kent is the choice of professionals and consumers the world across. Crafted with the best quality materials from around the world, the body has a profound and rich black mat effect. The handle has rubber grips making it extremely ergonomic and stress free to use. Use your oils, creams and products and if by mistake you grab the brush, it just won?t slip off your hands. If you comb your hair too often or have a great amount of styling, setting & combing to do at home or in a salon, this rubberized handle won?t stress your wrists and fingers much.The bristles are mounted on a rubberized base, this base is resistant to water, treatments, conditioners, creams and product build-ups. High quality rubberized base gives that extra bounce, cushion and life to the brush.The hallmark of this series is the super premium quality of bristles, which are polished and finished using the most advanced technology. Due to this the bristles do not scratch the cuticle or damage your hair. When you use the brush for blow-drying, setting, styling or blast drying, the bristles close the cuticle and impart gloss and shine to the hair. Made with a very high quality premium material, these bristles are heat resistant imparting years to the life of the brush. Investment in a good quality brush makes a lot of sense when you spend thousands on consumable products like shampoos, conditioners and treatments. Kent Air Hedz series is one such great investment you will make.You ideal routine after a shampoo or hair wash should be conditioning, detangling and then combing and if required blow-drying. Do no go straight from a shampoo to combing. Your hair and hair roots are in the weakest form when wet. Don?t detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb, although you don?t see a lot of hair in the comb after the detangling process, but you would have damaged your hair to a great extent and the hair would have fallen off if not on comb.The AH8 is a great detangling brush which allows you to detangle your hair with ease and then comb and set them with absolute control. Ideal for short, medium & long hair, this combination is every hair aficionados dream come true. You can use the AHP8 as a detangling, combing and blow-drying brush too. Kent is a 235 years old British brand of brushes. Known for its superior quality and innovations, Kent is the largest and oldest brush company in the world. Kent offers everything in brushes ranging from hair, tooth, body, nail, and shoe brushes for the quality-seeking consumer who wants nothing but the very best in the world.

Produces compact backcombed foundations that stay put.Tangle Teezer Aqua SplashThe Aqua Splash is another breakthrough innovation from Tangle Teezer. It is an ideal backwash brush for a salon or for your bathroom. It is designed to work with water. Detangleswet hair quickly with painless brushstrokes, thanks to the unique, make and ergonomic design.A wide-tooth comb is great for dispensing conditioner through your hair in the shower, but it can get grungy fast. Enter the Tangle Teezer Aqua Splash. The cylindrical, lightweight brush offers a nonslip grip and rounded edges for painless, efficient detangling. It also stands upright on its own, so it can hygienically drip-dry.The most unique features of Aqua Splash are:ROUNDED EDGES: For smooth, free-flowing detanglingHOLLOW DESIGN: For easy, lightweight handlingDRYING FEET: For a hygenic, drip-dry finish? Use as you would a round styling brush?with arolling wrist action.? Curve the brush underneath the hair or on top for effective detangling results.? Ideal for medium to long lengths.? Perfect for distributing color solutions and conditioners evenly through wet hair, top to tip. Turns regular conditioners into deluxe treatments; improves the consistency of color applications.? Distributing rich conditioners evenly with the Aqua Splash prevents spot build-ups that could lead to weak blow-dries.

It's a super smooth operator that works the minute hair is lathered and rinsed. Glides through wet, vulnerable and colour treated hair with no pulling, tugging or yanking. Hair peace at last. If you have been wondering how your special hair stylist handles all those tangles, grab one of The Original for use at home or salon. Tangle Teezer Original adds an amazing shine and gloss while detangling your hair. You will love your hair more and more everyday. Detangles wet and dry hair with no pulling, tugging or dragging. Ergonomic design makes it easy on wrist and joints, and speeds up the pace. Use it to brush through sectioned-off hair before blow-drying. Enhances the performance of heat-styling hairbrushes. After flat ironing, two or three slow brush strokes through each section as it cools will help hair remain straighter longer. Reduces hair loss caused by conventional brushes. Reduces matting and bonding around hair extension bonds. Makes backcombing a breeze. Produces compact backcombed foundations that stay put.

It has a removable cover to protect the patented and innovative teeth from fluff and dirt. ? Delivers a glossy finish to every style.? Backbrushes brilliantly to give any look a quick boost.? Title: Corioliss Professional Blow Drying & Styling Brush Set 3
Description: Corioliss Red Line Professional Blowdrying & Styling BrushCorioliss presents the brush red line edition, with a thermochromic colour change body and a light ceramic barrel that emits negative ions when hot. The fixed nylon find toothed combs are ideal for application of conditioning treatments, evenly sectioning the hair for greater concentrated distribution. A soft fluted handle that moulds to the hand for ultimate styling control and a unique detachable pin for sectioning gives the ultimate in comfort and professional styling. Features - Thermochromic colour change body shows working temperature and ionic effect Individual flame sealed fibres prevent tearing of the cuticle. Available in extra small, small, medium and large. Multipurpose tool: Can be used for styling, straightening, curling, setting and drying your hair. Thermochromic: Color changing barrel tells you when the brush is hot and ionization ready for use. Redline Comb technology: Ideal for product application such as keratin treatments, hair spa products, hair treatment products, etc. You can continue your blow drying while the redline takes care of even and consistent spreading and application of the product. Light Ceramic Barrel: Ceramic emits negative ions when hot eliminating static and frizz from your hair. Excellent Heat Retaining: Pure ceramic coating retains heat throughout styling hence you don?t need to keep the dryer on all the time. Flexible Sectioning Pin: Unique detachable sectioning pin allows easy sectioning with one hand. Soft Fluted handle: Ergonomically designed and rubberized for best grip and stress-free prolonged usage.Corioliss Soft Cushion Large Paddle Brush with Mic DesignMic Brush has a perfect body shape for detangling and straightening out long hair types. The cushioned soft ball tip quills gently massage the scalp whilst brushing and the soft fluted handle molds to the hand. Features: Anti static rubber cushioned pad prevents fly-away hair Unique, detachable flexible section pin allows easy sections with one hand

Title: Tangle Teezer Combo Salon Elite Orange and Yellow and Aqua Pink and White
Description: Tangle Teezer Salon EliteThe Salon Elite Series of Tangle Teezer is the The Detangling Brush and Styling Brush that detangles and styles rapidly, while treating hair with TLC. This pro brush contours the head and produces a perfect brushstroke, root to tip. Salon Elite gives professional results in the palm of your hand. Detangling wet and dry hair without any tugs or pulls, it has an innovative centralised concave design that delivers firm, salon style brushstrokes from roots to ends. Perfect to pick-up-your-preening pace!The most special features of the brush are:PATENTED TEETH: Designed to flex over tangles without pulling or snaggingCENTRALISED CONCAVE DESIGN: Delivers firm, salon style brushstrokes from roots to ends by contouring to the head STRATEGIC TEETH SPACING: Helps reduce matting and knotting around extension and weave bonds. Less hair ends up in the brush and more on your head? Detangles wet and dry hair with no pulling, tugging or dragging.? Ergonomic design makes it easy on wrist and joints, and speeds up the pace.? Use it to brush through sectioned-off hair before blow-drying? Enhances the performance of heat-styling hairbrushes.? After flat ironing, two or three slow brush strokes through each section as it cools will help hair remain straighter longer. ? Reduces hair loss caused by conventional brushes.? Reduces matting and bonding around hair extension bonds.? Makes backcombing a breeze. Produces compact backcombed foundations that stay put.Tangle Teezer Aqua SplashThe Aqua Splash is another breakthrough innovation from Tangle Teezer. It is an ideal backwash brush for a salon or for your bathroom. It is designed to work with water. Detangleswet hair quickly with painless brushstrokes, thanks to the unique, make and ergonomic design.A wide-tooth comb is great for dispensing conditioner through your hair in the shower, but it can get grungy fast. Enter the Tangle Teezer Aqua Splash. The cylindrical, lightweight brush offers a nonslip grip and rounded edges for painless, efficient detangling. It also stands upright on its own, so it can hygienically drip-dry.The most unique features of Aqua Splash are:ROUNDED EDGES: For smooth, free-flowing detanglingHOLLOW DESIGN: For easy, lightweight handlingDRYING FEET: For a hygenic, drip-dry finish? Use as you would a round styling brush?with arolling wrist action.? Curve the brush underneath the hair or on top for effective detangling results.? Ideal for medium to long lengths.? Perfect for distributing color solutions and conditioners evenly through wet hair, top to tip. Turns regular conditioners into deluxe treatments; improves the consistency of color applications.? Distributing rich conditioners evenly with the Aqua Splash prevents spot build-ups that could lead to weak blow-dries.

Title: Tangle Teezer Compact Styler Detangling Brush
Description: "If you have loved the Compacts by Tangle Teezer, the new Pink Baubleliciousis bound to drive you nuts. The hottest addition to our classic collection of cute Compact Stylers. This super stylish Detangler is the must have accessory of the season. With its sleek, shiny surface it will never fail to impress when your hair is in desperate need of an extra boost. Whether youre looking to gently add some texture at the roots, tame those stray away hairs or add polish and shine to a finished style, the Compact Styler is your new best friend whilst youre on the go. Fitting into even the smallest of handbags, its detachable cover protects teeth from debris, giving your hair a clean sweep every time. Forcefully brushing through your hair after showering is really, really bad for it; your hair is more fragile when its wet, therefore, ripping through with a comb or brush causes breakage, and will also pull a lot of it out. You might be left with a lot of hair in your comb/brush than on your head. Tangle Teezers are the solution for detangling any type of hair around the world. The tangle teezer glides through your hair without tugging it, it causes a lot less damage, and therefore its much kinder to your hair than a regular brush or comb.They add a surprisingly amazing shine and gloss while detangling your hair. Whether you need quick detangling in the elevator or your car or your cubicle or your date or practically anywhere, the compact styler & detangler comes absolutely handy. Tangle Teezer compact styler & detangler is the new gold standard for hi-voltage hair, An innovative hairbrush that is cute in size and big on style, it can be popped into your bag and pulled out to reboot hair in seconds. It has a removable cover to protect the patented and innovative teeth from fluff and dirt. This compact Styler delivers gloss & shine to finish every style. Backbrushes brilliantly to give any look a quick boost. Then it undoes the backbrushing, quickly and painlessly. Ideal for short and long hair. Re-energizes styles with instant shine after a run-in with wind or weather. Adorable click-on, click-off cover protects teeth from dirt and damage. Then it undoes the backbrushing, quickly and painlessly. Ideal for short and long hair. Re-energizes styles with instant shine after a run-in with windor weather. Adorable click-on, click-off cover protects teeth from dirt anddamage. Its a brilliant gift idea!Tangle Teezer Compact Styler can be used with oil, shampoo, water, treatments, conditioners, hair spa treatments and practically anything except acidic products and excess heat.Take good care of this little darling and it will surely last you ages. And before we forget let us remind you that the compact is a deadly effective weapon against those tough tangles that trouble you everyday. Title: Aneer Large Reusable Menstrual Cup(Pack of 1)
Description: A menstrual cup is form of reusable menstrual protection. It is inserted into the vagina to collect menstrual fluids. Once in place it forms a seal, preventing blood flowing out of the vagina by collecting it in its cup shaped reservoir. Unlike a tampon which absorbs the blood along with the vaginas natural secretions, a menstrual cup simply holds the fluids until you remove it  so they do not dry out the vagina and do not hold the TSS risk that tampons do.They hold around 20-30ml, which is for most women will cope with a full day without emptying, and at most perhaps you would need to empty it a few times a day for a very heavy flow. A menstrual cup will last (with proper care) for around 10 years, perhaps longer, so while the initial outlay is high, it pays for itself with savings pretty quick.

Title: Kent FD10 Pure Beechwood Pure Natural Briste Bath Brush
Description: Kent FD10 Bath Brush is a part of the luxurious AQUA BATH & BODY RANGE from Kent brushes, a 235-Years-Old brand of brushes from the United Kingdom.A selection of luxurious body brushes in natural bristle and finest treated timber only find place in this range of Kent. Kent's Bodycare products are beautifully made in natural bristle and finest wood. They are designed to compliment the body shape and clean, massage, stimulate and exfoliate the skin leaving it toned and invigorated.Body brushing removes dead skin and opens up clogged pores, while improving blood circulation to the skin. Routine use of a cellulite brush encourages the mobilization of lymphatic fluids which in turn draws away toxic wastes that contribute to the formation of cellulite. he light pressure against your skin and the direction in which you brush helps move lymph fluid into the lymph nodes so this waste can then be eliminated. Your body naturally does this, but dry brushing speeds up the process and at the same time boosts circulation, delivering oxygenated blood to the skin and other organs, which helps them do their jobs better. Always brush from the feet upwards towards the waist and from right to left in small circular strokes to help move toxins through the lymph nodes. Then immerse yourself fully in a salt bath to help draw toxins out through the skin.The Kent FD10 is a multipurpose brush which can be used for dry body brushing as well as a bath and body Scrub-brush. The body of the brush (handle & the brush base) are made out of 100% beechwood polished to a craftsman's perfection and veneer finished. The handle is smooth finished and ergonomically curved to hold the base of the brush and is long enought to reach all those hard to reach places. You can use the brush as a bath bat or for polishing skin,dry brushing to reduce cellulite, and improve blood circulation in your body. Natural bristles used by Kent are the best that can ever touch your skin. For the best effect of dry scrubbing and bath brushing you need firm bristles. Natural bristles offer numerous advantages like invigorating your skin, pulling off grime better than plastic or nylon brustles, scrubbing off dead cells better than artificial bristles, and you would obviously like something very natural touching your skin. Right ?Kent is a 235-Years-Old premium brush company from the United Kingdom. For over two centuries Kent has been making the best quality brushes for head to toe. The humble hair brush takes on a new statuswhen it is a Kent brush; something to be desired, enjoyed and coveted. Hair brushesfrom the past but very much part of the future. Combining finest timbers, carefullyselected bristle, and innovative materials to meet the demanding needs of a modernworld, Kent offers a range that encapsulates all that is important for looking after hairand body. Our Royal Warrant is testimony to our quality and serves as a proudendorsement of all that is best in British brush making.To keep your favourite Kent FD10 bath brush in the best possible condition always shake off excess water and ensure it is stored with bristles pointed downward when not in use. You should hang the FD10 with the handle up for the water to drain off completely after use under shower. Kent uses the best quality materials available on earth for all it's products. Taken good care of Kent brushes will last and serve you and your family for ages.
CategoryName: Health and Beauty>Beauty Accessories>Bath and Spa Accessories>Bath Brushes
